page.title: 04WYE SEWAGE WORKS
page.content: The village sewage goes to the pumping station and some goes straight to the sewage works.If it all went to sewage works it would over flow because it is too much.First it starts at the storage tank.Then it gradually goes to the sedimentation tank which gets all the sludge out of the water.The sedimentation tanks are up side down pyramid shape with a square on top.The filters are two round circles joined together.There are four long poles going round.They drop the water coming from the sedimentation tanks.The filters are filled up with stones and worms.The stones stop the bacteria from going to the humus tanks.By then it is almost clean.Next to the humus tanks is a shed.In the shed they keep all their tools.Also they control the whole of the sewage works.
